alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 2:12PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cascade County through 315 PM MDT... At 211 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Great Falls, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Vaughn, First Peoples Buffalo Jump State Park and Ulm. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
